attributes.action: Join the Euro Currency as soon as possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is long overdue for Britain to join with it's European Cousins. It would be good for business, good for Britain's reputation in Europe and the rest of the World and good for all those holiday makers currently lining the pockets of middle men every time they have to exchange currency.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Join the Euro Currency as soon as possible."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11809.asp

Prime Minister's Office
